(Case no : 384/96
IN THE SUPREME COURT OF APPEAL OF SOUTH AFRICA
In the matter between:
DONALD JOHN LOW, N.O
First Appellant
ELSIE EDITH LOW, N.O.
Second Appellant
MARA ODETTE WARREN, N.O.
Third Appellant
and
CONSORTIUM CONSOLIDATED
CORPORATION (PTY) LIMITED
Respondent

Hefer, Vivier, FH Grosskopf, Plewman JJA et
Farlam AJA
Date of hearing : 27 August 1998
Date of delivery : 29 September 1998
JUDGMENT
2

sections.facts: The appellants, Donald John Low, Elsie Edith Low and Mara Odette Warren, appealed against a decision of the lower court involving Consortium Consolidated Corporation (Pty) Limited. The excerpt does not provide details of the factual dispute.
sections.issues: The legal issues for determination are not specified in the excerpt, but would relate to the grounds of appeal raised by the Low family against the respondent.

sections.conclusion: The judgment delivered on 29 September 1998 concluded the appeal, but the excerpt does not disclose the substantive outcome.
